results.title: Metformin Alleviated the Neuronal Oxidative Stress in Hippocampus of Rats under Single Prolonged Stress.
results.text_hl: These results indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ attenuated oxidative stress in the hippocampus in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ under @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Person_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016750 @@@SPS@@@.
